content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'meta_dlsingraphic01_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [meta_dlsingraphic01_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://meta@dlsingraphic01.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[elements]
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[elements] (
	[elements] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'elements.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [meta_dlsingraphic01_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [dbo].[elements]
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'meta_dlsingraphic01_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [meta_dlsingraphic01_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://meta@dlsingraphic01.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[referenceTime] (
	[numberOfMonths] bigint
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'referencetime.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [meta_dlsingraphic01_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [dbo].[referenceTime]
GO

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[Temperatur];
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'business_dlsingraphic01_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [business_dlsingraphic01_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://business@dlsingraphic01.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[Temperatur] (
	[referenceTime] nvarchar(4000),
	[sourceId] nvarchar(4000),
	[elementId] nvarchar(4000),
	[Temperature] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = '/',
	DATA_SOURCE = [business_dlsingraphic01_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [dbo].[Temperatur]
ORDER BY referenceTime DESC
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'meta_dlsingraphic01_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [meta_dlsingraphic01_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://meta@dlsingraphic01.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[sources]

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[sources] (
	[Source] nvarchar(4000),
	[Lat] float,
	[Lon] float,
	[ID] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'sources.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [meta_dlsingraphic01_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [dbo].[sources]
GO
